alert.note: Alert for Alamance; Chatham; Guilford; Randolph (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 8:46PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Alamance, Randolph, southeastern Guilford and western Chatham Counties through 930 PM EDT... At 844 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Siler City, moving to the northwest at 25 mph. This storm was part of a cluster of strong storms extending across southern Randolph county and western Chatham county. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Burlington, Asheboro, Graham, Randleman, Pittsboro, Siler City, North Carolina Zoo, Seagrove, Liberty and Haw River. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
